key recommendation.title: Main Recommendation
key recommendation.summary: Proceed to partner meeting; require security review; request 18-month runway plan.

insights.title: Insight 1
insights.summary: Demand signals strong in DACH with 120% YoY growth.

insights.title: Insight 2
insights.summary: Gross margin sustainable at 68% per cohort analysis.

insights.title: Insight 3
insights.summary: Two critical IP dependencies; escrow or alternative vendors needed.
